thread.title: Samsung Galaxy A3, A5 and A7 2017 editions reportedly launching in India soon
thread.title_full: Samsung Galaxy A3, A5 and A7 2017 editions reportedly launching in India soon

title: Samsung Galaxy A3, A5 and A7 2017 editions reportedly launching in India soon
text:
Samsung Galaxy A3, A5 and A7 2017 editions reportedly launching in India... Samsung Galaxy A3, A5 and A7 2017 editions reportedly launching in India soon By - February 20, 2017 “Last year’s Galaxy A series is expected to get a refresh in India in the next few weeks” 
Samsung unveiled the 2017 variants of the Galaxy A3, Galaxy A5 and Galaxy A7 in January. Now a report by Pricebaba claims that Samsung is planning to launch the Galaxy A3 (2017) , Galaxy A5 (2017) and Galaxy A7 (2017) in India in the next few weeks. 
To recap on the specs, the Samsung Galaxy A3 (2017) is an entry-level offering with a 4.7-inch HD display and Android Marshmallow. It is powered by a 1.6GHz octa-core Exynos 7870 processor, mated to 2GB of RAM. The phone comes with 16GB of expandable storage, a 13MP rear snapper, an 8MP selfie camera, 4G LTE and a 2,350mAh battery. 
The Galaxy A5 (2017) offers a 5.2-inch full HD display, an octa-core Exynos 7880 processor, 3GB of RAM, Mali T860-MP4 graphics, 32GB of expandable storage, 16MP/16MP cameras, Marshmallow and a 3,000mAh battery with fast charging support. The Galaxy A7 (2017) offers a 5.7-inch full HD display and a 3,600mAh battery with fast charging support. The rest of its specs are the same as the Galaxy A5. 
The Samsung Galaxy A3 (2017), A5 (2017) and A7 (2017) also boast IP68 certification for dust and water resistance, which means they can survive in up to five feet of water for 30 minutes. If the report is true, we won’t have to wait for too long to find out their pricing and availability for India.
